name: EV Charger Rebate for Multi-Family and Non-Profits
description: Up to $80,000 for installing EV chargers at schools, non-profits, multi-family, and mixed-use properties
fullDescription: City of Palo Alto Utilities provides substantial rebates for installing EV charging infrastructure at multi-family buildings, schools, and non-profit organizations.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $80,000 in rebates
- For schools and educational facilities
- For non-profit organizations
- For multi-family residential buildings
- For mixed-use properties
- Supports EV adoption in shared spaces
howToGetIt:
1. Must be eligible property type in Palo Alto
2. Must be CPAU electric customer
3. Apply through CPAU before installation
4. Get project approval
5. Install EV charging infrastructure
6. Submit documentation for rebate
